response.original_title: Francie Sexe et amour en Israël
response.overview: Get to know one of the youngest countries in the world from an unusual point of view. In a country full of contradictions, strict Orthodox rules are mixed with sexual looseness... The documentary is a collage of several stories of contemporary Israelis who represent different social and religious groups and provides a holistic picture of the love sphere in one of the most contradictory states. We will see a modern Orthodox Jew, Lior, who is looking forward to marrying a strongly religious young man, with whom she has not even tied the knot yet, or a young Jewish couple who are prevented from having a church ceremony due to their parents' foreign origin, and who must have their civil ceremony abroad, since civil marriages they do not exist in Israel. We will also not forget the relationships between young soldiers of both sexes, since military service is compulsory in this country for both boys and girls, homosexual relationships,
